{"step_by_step_thinking": "The patient has an allergy to costume jewelry. Costume jewelry is often made from base metals like nickel and chromium, which are common allergens. High gold and palladium-silver are less likely to cause allergic reactions because they are more pure and less likely to contain allergenic metals. Low gold, on the other hand, may contain more base metals and therefore could potentially cause an allergic reaction.", "answer_choice": "B. Low gold"}
